body:
Hello, I am trying to run a glare analysis but when I jun the simulation I get the following error: 1. Solution exception:Failed to read the results!
0 rays, 0.00% after 0.0000 hours fatal - cannot find function file "perezlum.cal" 0 rays, 0.00% after 0.0003 hours fatal - cannot find function file "perezlum.cal" 0 rays, 0.00% after 0.0000 hours Thank you, Blanca
